Key Arguments: The submission emphasizes the importance of media literacy in combating misinformation and disinformation.
It highlights the need for a common language and national benchmark for digital capability in Australia.
The ADIA outlines the Australian Digital Capability Framework and its role in improving digital literacy.
The submission does not provide commentary on other aspects of the proposed legislation.
Notable Quotes: Uplifting digital capability for all Australians will have the associated impact of increasing a person's media literacy, digital resilience and digital citizenship.
At present there is no common language in Australia that describes digital capability.
